name: Old-School Miso Soup, Everything You Ever Wanted to Know
description: During the three years I lived in Japan, I ate a lot of miso soup, but I never knew what it was. I just figured it was extracted from, you know, a miso plant, or maybe the miso bird, a Japanese relative of the chicken. Now the tables have turned. I've morphed into an obnoxious miso-soup purist. Watch me make it from scratch here.
